item.title: Specialized Recalls Bicycles with Steerer Tube Collars Due to Fall and Injury Hazards
item.description: The bicycle’s steerer tube collar can crack if exposed to corrosion resulting in sudden loss of steering control, posing fall and injury hazards to the rider.

item.title: DICK’S Sporting Goods Recalls Hunters’ Tree Stands Due to Fall Hazard
item.description: The weld on the seats can break and cause the seat to fall from the tree, posing a fall hazard.

item.title: KTM and Husqvarna Motorcycles Recall Motorcycles Due to Crash Hazard (Recall Alert)
item.description: The throttle can become stuck in the open position, posing a crash hazard to the rider.

item.title: Marpac Recalls Sound Machines Due to Burn Hazard
item.description: The sound machine’s internal battery can leak and cause an electrical short, posing a burn hazard.

item.title: Vivitar Recalls Hot/Cold Massage Balls Due to Burn Hazard; Sold Exclusively at Target
item.description: The massage balls can leak or rupture during or after microwaving, posing a burn hazard to consumers.

item.title: Quality Bicycle Products Recalls Bicycles Due To Injury Hazard
item.description: The bicycle’s fork legs can break, posing an injury hazard.

item.title: Matco Tools Wireless Chargers Recalled by Professional Tool Products Due to Burn Hazard
item.description: The wireless chargers can overheat, posing a burn hazard.

item.title: Spector & Co. Recalls Power Bank Chargers Due to Fire Hazard
item.description: The charger can overheat while recharging, posing a fire hazard.

item.title: Amerex Group Recalls Infant Fur Jackets Due to Choking Hazard
item.description: The jacket’s snaps can detach, posing a choking hazard to young children.

item.title: Ocean Reef Recalls Neptune Space Integrated Diving Masks Due to Injury Hazard
item.description: The diving mask regulator can cause restricted airflow, posing an injury hazard to divers.

item.title: John Deere Recalls Attachment Kits for Compact Utility Tractor Snow Blowers and Brooms Due to Injury Hazard (Recall Alert)
item.description: The Attachment Kits are missing the product Operator's Manual which details proper attachment and use of the product, posing an injury hazard.

item.title: Midwest-CBK Recalls Baby Rattle Socks Due to Choking Hazard
item.description: Small ornaments can detach from the socks, posing a choking hazard to young children.

item.title: Interline Brands Recalls Swivel Fittings Due to Fire Hazard
item.description: The fittings can leak, posing a fire hazard.

item.title: Cambridge Elevating Recalls Home Elevators Due to Fall Hazard
item.description: The landing door on the elevators can unlock without the elevator present, posing a fall hazard.

item.title: Rechargeable Power Banks Recalled by Daniel M. Friedman & Associates Due to Fire Hazard
item.description: The power banks can overheat, posing a fire hazard

item.title: Bulk Unlimited Recalls Children’s Globes Due to Fire and Burn Hazards (Recall Alert)
item.description: The globe’s internal wires can short out and overheat, posing fire and burn hazards.

item.title: Alpha Guardian Recalls Stack-On Gun Safes Due to Lock Failure and Injury Hazard
item.description: A bolt malfunction can cause the safe to open without the use of a key or combination, allowing access to any firearms stored inside, posing an injury hazard.

item.title: Air King America Recalls Wall-Mounted Range Hoods Due to Injury Hazard
item.description: The wall mounting anchors provided with the range hoods do not adequately secure the hood to the wall, posing an injury hazard to the consumer.

item.title: American Honda Recalls Portable Generators Due to Fire and Burn Hazards
item.description: The portable generator can leak gasoline from the fuel valve, posing fire and burn hazards.

item.title: Kubota Recalls Zero Turn Mowers Due to Fire Hazard (Recall Alert)
item.description: The throttle cable can make contact with internal electric wiring, posing a fire hazard.

item.title: myStromer Recalls Electric Bicycles Due to Crash and Injury Hazards (Recall Alert)
item.description: The bicycle stem can break, posing crash and injury hazards to the rider.

item.title: Weatherbeeta USA Recalls Riding Saddles Due to Fall Hazard
item.description: The recalled saddles were manufactured with screws that were too short, causing the girth of the saddle to detach from the tree of the saddle, posing a fall hazard to the rider.

item.title: Tech Gear 5.7 Recalls Performance Heated Socks Due to Fire and Burn Hazards
item.description: The lithium-ion battery can overheat, melt or ignite when charged with a charger other than the one provided with the product, posing fire and burn hazards to the user.

item.title: O’Brien Watersports Recalls Water Skis Due to Injury Hazard
item.description: The skis can detach from the binding during a fall, allowing the ski to break, posing an injury hazard to the user

item.title: Brush Art Recalls WIC Nutrition Plates Due to Fire Hazard
item.description: The plates are incorrectly labeled as microwave-safe. They contain aluminum, which poses a fire hazard if microwaved.

item.title: Kawasaki USA Recalls Off-Highway Utility Vehicles Due to Fuel Leak, Fire Hazards (Recall Alert)
item.description: The vehicle’s oil cooler hoses can separate and the fuel tank cap gasket can crack allowing fuel to leak, posing a fire hazard.

item.title: H-E-B Recalls Sauté Pans Due to Laceration Hazard
item.description: The glass lid can crack or shatter during normal use, posing a laceration hazard.

item.title: HP Expands Recall of Batteries for Notebook Computers and Mobile Workstations Due to Fire and Burn Hazards
item.description: The lithium-ion batteries can overheat, posing fire and burn hazards.

item.title: TJX Recalls Heating Pads Due to Fire and Burn Hazards; Sold Exclusively at T.J. Maxx and Marshalls Stores
item.description: The heating pads can overheat during use, posing fire and burn hazards.

item.title: Arctic Cat Recalls Textron Off-Highway Utility Vehicles Due to Fuel Leak and Fire Hazard (Recall Alert)
item.description: Fuel can leak from the fuel line, posing a fire hazard.

item.title: Arctic Cat Recalls Textron Off-Highway Utility Vehicles Due to Crash Hazard (Recall Alert)
item.description: The lower front suspension arm can fail, posing a crash hazard.

item.title: Clinical Resolution Laboratory Recalls Topical Anesthetic Due to Failure to Meet Child Resistant Closure Requirement; Risk of Poisoning
item.description: The packaging is not child resistant as required by the Poison Prevention Packaging Act. The pain relieving cream contains lidocaine, posing a risk of poisoning to young children if they put it on their skin or ingest it.

item.title: Biotouch Recalls Topical Anesthetic Due to Failure to Meet Child Resistant Closure Requirement; Risk of Poisoning
item.description: The package is not child resistant as required by the Poison Prevention Packaging Act. The pain relieving gel contains lidocaine, posing a risk of poisoning to young children.

item.title: Harbor Freight Tools Recalls Propane Torches Due to Burn Hazard
item.description: The trigger on the torches that engages the flame can fail to disengage when the trigger is no longer pressed, posing a burn hazard.

item.title: Harbor Freight Tools Recalls 12V Rechargeable Flashlights Due to Overheating and Burn Hazards
item.description: The flashlight can overheat while charging, posing a burn hazard to consumers.

item.title: D&D Futon Furniture Recalls Sleeper Chair Folding Foam Beds Due to Violation of Federal Mattress Flammability Standard
item.description: The mattress fails to meet the mandatory federal flammability standard for mattresses, posing a fire hazard.

item.title: JumpSport Recalls Mini Trampolines Due to Injury Hazard; New Instructions and Warning Labels Provided
item.description: The folding trampoline’s frame can forcefully hit the user, posing an injury hazard.

item.title: Shearwater Recalls Diving Transmitters Due to Drowning Hazard
item.description: The transmitters can fail to signal the tank pressure due to interference while using two transmitters in the same dive. This poses a drowning hazard to divers.

item.title: SRAM Recalls Bicycle Gear Hubs Due to Crash and Injury Hazards
item.description: The brakes in the gear hubs can fail, posing crash and injury hazards to the rider.

item.title: Crate and Barrel Recalls Holiday Milk Bottles Due To Laceration Hazard
